Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

nevada (development version)

nevada 0.2.0

CRAN release: 2023-09-03

  • Improved nvd constructor.
  • Updated GHA scripts.
  • Added tSNE and UMAP viz.
  • Added support for graphs with different sizes and/or unlabeled graphs.
  • Added support for distance matrices in test functions.
  • Added support for parallelization via the future framework and furrr.

nevada 0.1.0

CRAN release: 2021-09-25

  • Initial release.
  • Added a NEWS.md file to track changes to the package.
